abstracts.cdata!:
The Power Project for Bank financing
            consists of (i) the construction of the 60 MW Jurun-Marinala
            hydroelectric station and a 138 kv transmission line, about
            50 kilometers in length, to transmit power generated at
            Escuintla and Jurun-Marinala to Guatemala City; (ii) the
            installation of a second 15 MW gas turbine generator at
            Escuintla and a 5 MW diesel generating plant at Puerto
            Matias de Galvez and (iii) consultants' services.
